testcase.name: Create RFQ with Valid Information and Verify Additional Conditions
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to the Customer Dashboard..............................passed When User clicks on the Create RFQ button...................................passed And navigated to the Create RFQ page........................................passed And Inquiry date is the same as the created date............................passed And If priority is normal, Due date UMG to NCS is four days ahead and is disabled.passed And If priority is QTA, Due date NCS to UMG is the next date of the created date.passed And Status UMG to Cust is open by default and is disabled...................passed And Status NCS to UMG is open and is disabled...............................passed And User enters the account number..........................................passed And Customer number is not null and is disabled.............................passed And Customer city is not null and is disabled...............................passed And Account manager is not null and selected from dropdown..................passed And Salesperson is not null and selected from dropdown......................passed And User adds remarks from the sales area...................................passed And User adds comments from the NCS engineer area...........................passed And User attaches files (drag & drop, upload, remove).......................passed And User verifies top bar features..........................................passed And User verifies side nav bar features.....................................passed Then RFQ is successfully created............................................passed

testcase.name: User navigates to Customer Quotation Dashboard page
testcase.system-out: Given the User is logged in with "http://192.168.150.20:8080/bottie_quote/login.html" already on the Customer Quotation Dashboard page.passed When the User navigates to the Customer Quotations Page By "mallikarjuna.ss" and "Malli@123karjuna".passed And verifies the existence and clickability of the side navigation bar......passed And verifies the existence of the quotation table with table headers........passed And verifies the existence and clickability of the Search button............passed And verifies the existence and clickability of the Create RFQ button........passed And verifies the existence of the Search Dropdown with a specific value.....passed And verifies the existence and clickability of the Clear button.............passed And verifies the exisistence of the search text box and confirms that the user can enter text.passed And verifies the presence of the Unimicron logo.............................passed And verifies the BQ title...................................................passed And verifies the application version........................................passed And verifies the existence of the language icon and confirms its clickability.passed And verifies the existence of the logout icon...............................passed Then click on the logout icon, and the user is taken to the login page......passed Then quit the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.name: User logs in to BQ Dashboard
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens a Chrome browser.......................................passed When the user enter to the BQ login "http://192.168.150.20:8080/bottie_quote/login.html".passed And varify title............................................................passed And varify LoginPage LargeBluebox...........................................passed And user will see With botti quote in bold latters..........................passed And placeholder as User Name................................................passed And placeholder as Password.................................................passed And by defult in English....................................................passed And enters the Username "mallikarjuna.ss"...................................passed And enters the password "Malli@123karjuna"..................................passed And clicks on the login button..............................................passed And succeful authentication mesg............................................passed And Unimicorn logo present..................................................passed Then the user should be on the BQ dashboard page............................passed Then quite the browser......................................................passed
